item.title: Say goodbye to grep
item.description: ack is a famous code search tool to replace grep (in a lot of use cases): https://beyondgrep.com/why-ack/ Now there is something even better. There is ag aka The Silver Searcher: ggreer/the_silver_searcher It is like ack, but faster. Why not just grep? Hella fast. Like really really fast. It is beautifully optimized C.
